channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
I get alot of random runtime errors when i open games and such on my computer, it will be fixed if i reformat but i would really rather not, since i always have to every like 2-3weeks...
I cant get a new computer until like january probably, this old shit must do for now.. Any ideas how to get rid of runtime errors, and error is unkown it said..

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Dont know how, like for instance i will show one example…

Gunzlauncher has caused an error in
.
Gunzlauncher will now close.

If you continue to experience problems, try restarting your computer

I did all that and even uninstalled and reinstalled but no effect…

Read full topic
